content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: skull_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "andesite_wall", "quantity": 54, "index": 14}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 11, "index": 15}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 3, "index": 24}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 60, "index": 26}, {"type": "black_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 27, "index": 38}, {"type": "leather_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "nether_wart_block", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a skull_banner_pattern, I need to craft paper first. To craft paper, I need to place 3 sugar_canes on top of each other in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will start by moving one sugar_cane from slot 24 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: To craft a skull_banner_pattern, I need to craft paper first. To craft paper, I need to place 3 sugar_canes on top of each other in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move another sugar_cane from slot 24 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 2 with quantity 1

thought: To craft a skull_banner_pattern, I need to craft paper first. To craft paper, I need to place 3 sugar_canes on top of each other in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the last sugar_cane from slot 24 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: skull_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "paper", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "andesite_wall", "quantity": 54, "index": 14}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 11, "index": 15}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 60, "index": 26}, {"type": "black_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 27, "index": 38}, {"type": "leather_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "nether_wart_block", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a skull_banner_pattern, I need to craft paper first. I have crafted the paper, so I will move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3

TASK: Craft an item of type: skull_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "paper", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "andesite_wall", "quantity": 54, "index": 14}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 11, "index": 15}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 60, "index": 26}, {"type": "black_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 27, "index": 38}, {"type": "leather_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "nether_wart_block", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a skull_banner_pattern, I need to place a piece of paper and a wither_skeleton_skull side by side. The paper is in slot 11, so I will move it to the crafting grid. I choose slot 1 because it is the first available slot in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "andesite_wall", "quantity": 54, "index": 14}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 11, "index": 15}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 60, "index": 26}, {"type": "black_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 27, "index": 38}, {"type": "leather_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "nether_wart_block", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a skull_banner_pattern, I need to place a piece of paper and a wither_skeleton_skull side by side. The wither_skeleton_skull is in slot 25, so I will move it to the crafting grid. I choose slot 2 because it is the second available slot in the crafting grid, and it is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
